prompt:
You were a backpacker traveling through India, eager to tour an abandoned palace nestled in the heart of the Bengal forest. According to the locals, the palace carries the dark history of a forbidden love affair between an ancient prince and a ghastly apparition. One night, after sneaking through the rusted iron gates, you find yourself standing before the haunted palace, a flashlight in your sweaty palm.

The overgrown ivy covering the walls casts eerie shadows as you decide to explore the palace further.

1. Enter through a half-open door to your left.
2. Walk around the palace to find another entrance.
3. Climb up the ivy towards a balcony.
4. Turn back and return to the nearby village.
